4.4. manager.globals.constants¶

constants.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines Manager package default constants through the Constants class.

Others:

4.4.1. Classes¶

class manager.globals.constants.Constants[source]¶

Defines Manager package default constants.
